mapper.update:
update STUDENT
STUDENT_SEQ = #{studentSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_CATEGORY = #{studentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_RANK = #{studentRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_TYPE = #{studentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STUDENT_COMPANY = #{studentCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_COMPANYID = #{studentCompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_UPCOMPANYID = #{studentUpcompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_DEPARTMENT = #{studentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_COIN = #{studentCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STUDENT_YEARTIME = #{studentYeartime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STUDENT_TELEPHONE = #{studentTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_EMAIL = #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_PASSWORD = #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_AT = #{studentAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STUDENT_DEL = #{studentDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENTONE_ID = #{studentoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENTTWO_ID = #{studenttwoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENTHREE_ID = #{studenthreeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_BXYXTIME = #{studentBxyxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STUDENT_BXXXTIME = #{studentBxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STUDENT_YXXXTIME = #{studentYxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STUDENT_XXXXTIME = #{studentXxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update STUDENT set STUDENT_SEQ = #{studentSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_CATEGORY = #{studentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_RANK = #{studentRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_TYPE = #{studentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STUDENT_COMPANY = #{studentCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_COMPANYID = #{studentCompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_UPCOMPANYID = #{studentUpcompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_DEPARTMENT = #{studentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_COIN = #{studentCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STUDENT_YEARTIME = #{studentYeartime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STUDENT_TELEPHONE = #{studentTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_EMAIL = #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_PASSWORD = #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_AT = #{studentAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STUDENT_DEL = #{studentDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENTONE_ID = #{studentoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENTTWO_ID = #{studenttwoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENTHREE_ID = #{studenthreeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_BXYXTIME = #{studentBxyxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STUDENT_BXXXTIME = #{studentBxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STUDENT_YXXXTIME = #{studentYxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STUDENT_XXXXTIME = #{studentXxxxtime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from STUDENT s ,ORGANIZATION o ,DEPARTMENT d where o.ORGANIZATION_ID=s.STUDENT_COMPANYID and d.DEPARTMENT_ID = s.STUDENT_DEPARTMENT and STUDENT_SEQ = #{studentSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STUDENT_PASSWORD = #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STUDENT_DEL = 1

select * from STUDENT z left join STUDENTONE t on z.STUDENTONE_ID=t.STUDENTONE_ID left join STUDENTTWO tt on z.STUDENTTWO_ID=tt.STUDENTTWO_ID left join STUDENTHREE ttt on z.STUDENTHREE_ID=ttt.STUDENTHREE_ID where z.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update STUDENT set STUDENT_COMPANYID = #{studentCompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STUDENT_DEPARTMENT in (select STUDENT_DEPARTMENT from DEPARTMENT where EPARTMENT_UPID=#{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from STUDENT z left join STUDENTONE t on z.STUDENTONE_ID=t.STUDENTONE_ID left join STUDENTTWO tt on z.STUDENTTWO_ID=tt.STUDENTTWO_ID left join STUDENTHREE ttt on z.STUDENTHREE_ID=ttt.STUDENTHREE_ID where STUDENT_DEL=1 and STUDENT_TYPE=1 and z.STUDENT_COMPANYID=#{studentCompanyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and STUDENT_DEPARTMENT = #{studentDepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from STUDENT where STUDENT_SEQ = #{studentSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STUDENT_DEL = 1

select * from STUDENT s ,ORGANIZATION o ,DEPARTMENT d ,STUDENTONE so where o.ORGANIZATION_ID=s.STUDENT_COMPANYID and d.DEPARTMENT_ID = s.STUDENT_DEPARTMENT and so.STUDENTONE_ID = s.STUDENTONE_ID and STUDENTONE_SFZH = #{studentoneSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STUDENT_DEL = 1 AND STUDENTONE_DEL = 1
